API¶

string_ops¶

package_creation_tutorial.string_ops.capitalize_words(s: str) → str[source]¶

Capitalize the first letter of each word in the given string.

Paramètres:

s (str) – The input string to capitalize.

Renvoie:

A new string with each word capitalized.

Type renvoyé:

str

package_creation_tutorial.string_ops.count_vowels(s: str) → int[source]¶

Count the number of vowels in the given string.

Paramètres:

s (str) – The input string to count vowels from.

Renvoie:

The number of vowels in the string.

Type renvoyé:

int

package_creation_tutorial.string_ops.reverse_string(s: str) → str[source]¶

Reverse the given string.

Paramètres:

s (str) – The input string to be reversed.

Renvoie:

The reversed string.

Type renvoyé:

str
